alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; Rutherford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford, Coffee, southwestern Warren, eastern Bedford, Grundy and southwestern Cannon Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Shelbyville to near Tullahoma. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McMinnville, Manchester, Tullahoma, Gruetli-Laager, Tracy City, Monteagle, Altamont, Coalmont, Morrison, Wartrace, Bell Buckle, Beersheba Springs, Normandy, Viola, Beechgrove, Raus, Summitville, Hillsboro, Pelham and Arnold AFB. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 91 and 135. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee.
